text: A wannan dare Ubangiji ya ce masa, “Ka ɗauki bijimi na biyu daga garken mahaifinka, wannan mai shekara bakwai.6.25 Ko kuwa Ka ɗauki balagaggen bijimi wanda ya yi girma daga garken mahaifinka Ka rushe bagaden mahaifinka na Ba’al ka sare ginshiƙin Ashera6.25 Wato, alamar alliya Ashera; a nan da kuma ko’ina a Mahukunta kusa da ita.
